description: Support to Constitution Making in Somalia

subproject.corporate outcome: Electoral laws, processes and institutions strengthen inclusive participation and professional electoral administration
subproject.description: The Somali Constitution Making Support Project aims at promoting reconciliation, peace and stability through a constitution-making process at the federal level in line with the Transitional Federal Charter (TFC). The project supports institutional machinery and representative mechanisms, encourages societal dialogue on constitutional issues and participation in the constitution - making process.
subproject.title: Support to Constitution Making

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to prevent, reduce and mitigate the impact of conflict

title: Democratisation and Constitution
